thread.title: What’s the best bar in your home state? (51 Photos)
thread.title_full: What’s the best bar in your home state? (51 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: What’s the best bar in your home state? (51 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Yelp is always putting out different restaurant rankings, but this time they shared a list of the best bars in each state. They use an algorithm based on ratings and reviews to find the best watering holes across this great nation. 
Since we’re an organization that enjoys the occasional drink we though it’s only right that we share this information with you. 
See what made the list in your home state and get inspired to travel and try a new bar this year. 
ALABAMA: The Hound in Auburn 2 
ALASKA: The Asylum in Ketchikan 3 
ARIZONA: The Whining Pig in Phoenix 4 
ARKANSAS: The Pantry Restaurant in Little Rock 5 
CALIFORNIA: Vino Nostra in Fullerton Advertisement
